thread.title: Sony to integrate YouView into Bravia TVs for 17,000 films and shows

title: Sony to integrate YouView into Bravia TVs for 17,000 films and shows
text:
Sony to integrate YouView into Bravia TVs for 17,000 films and shows 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Sony has announced a partnership with TV platform YouView that will put its services in Sony Bravia televisions. The YouView update will be ...
